summary: A lonely private investigator is contacted by a mysterious woman who pulls him into a mind game known as 'telephone walking'. Fascinated by her voice, Aloys discovers an imaginary universe that allows him to break out of his isolation.
cast: Georg Friedrich|Tilde von Overbeck|Kamil Krejcí|Yufei Li|Koi Lee|Sebastian Krähenbühl|Karl Friedrich|Peter Zumstein|Agnes Lampkin|Rahel Hubacher|Haroldo Simao|Tobias Bienz|Aaron Hitz|Barblin Leggio-Hänseler|Benjamin Merz|Arthur Miranda|Marlis Ochsner|Jürg Plüss|Alexander Seibt|Maja Stolle
keywords: one word title|written by director|mortuary|feather|dead body
title: Aloys
